description: PJON is a valid tool to quickly and comprehensibly build a network of devices for free without the need of a cloud service or a centralized platform you don’t fully control.

aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source, cross platform download utility operated in command-line. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink.
